javadoc:
Interface for notifying listeners when options change.

Register with {@link ToolOptions#addOptionsChangeListener(OptionsChangeListener)}.

methods.name: optionsChanged
methods.comment:
Notification that an option changed.
 
 Note: to reject an options change, you can throw a 
 OptionsVetoException.

params.name: options
params.comment: options object containing the property that changed

name: OptionsChangeListener
comment:
Interface for notifying listeners when options change.
 
 Register with ToolOptions#addOptionsChangeListener(OptionsChangeListener).
